body: The whole "innocent becomes a sex addict" trope really sucks. People can enjoy sex without it consuming their lives. Hard pass.

@Jesterrr hot damn, you're absolutely right, the moment the background coloring changed signaled the sharp turn the whole theme got, I can't believe I haven't noticed that. Also @AnkHit! @TheGuy100 , I don't actually have any knowledge of these characters from their original work, I am merely basing my assumptions on how scenarios like these would unfold in real life, knowing the little details I gathered from these 2 characters on this doujin alone. So you shouldn't take anything I said as an absolute fact, nothing is really ever set in stone anyways, as life is always so uncertain.

@ChampionofLove, fitting name; thanks for the thought provoking essay. Pleasure to read.
@Champion of Love is this a copypasta or are you actually brain damaged?
Thanks for the essay, bro.

In conclusion, this doujin is a great showcase of the power dynamic in a relationship going wrong, you could even say that the wife had a mind break. I suppose it is the result of repressing your urges, only to lose control of them once you loosen it up, even if it's just a little. This is a case in real life with mostly women too, as in some places society sexually represses them, and once they come into actual sexual contact, they are unable to navigate it properly, some ending up very bad if they aren't provided with a safety net. There is some biological truth to it, since women don't have a refractory period (or post-nut clarity, as it's usually called), but really it is the way you were raised as well as your immidiate environment where that ticking time bomb is planted. Other than that pretty hot doujin, wish it had some bdsm scenes too tho.

Most likely divorce, and having not accomplished anything in life, they'll most likely end up a similar fate that of an old homeless person. Even if they are fine with that, I believe the peak of happines is attained in other moments of life, moments that will most likely we overshadowed by their horniness. And that is not mentioning the poor child, whose life will be a series of hardships, if it even manages to retake the normal, stable life once it cuts off the deadbeat parents as it grows up. So even if you manage to justify the new lifestyle of the couple, ultimately it is the soon-to-be child that is the victim of such immoral behaviour, as it is the one who will bear the full weight of it's parent's sins, from start to finish.

The husband, being immoral as he is, also simply gives up, and now the scale has been destroyed, as no one is imposing rules; there's no one at the reins and at this point these two are no longer going anywhere in life. Now they're just in a freefall, consumed by their lust. This is made explicitly evident on page 25, where we can clearly see how no chores are being done (also possibly the husband quitting his job), and to top that off, the complete disregard to the pregnancy. Again, I get it that this is still a doujin, but just compare the wife's thoughts on her potential child as opposed to the very first scene (page 2) of the doujin. It's practically night and day. Sure, they may be in great happines now, but what will happen when they get older, and can no longer have sex?

The wife, once noticing this, decides to ease up on her side, and ackowledges she was enforcing too much power in the said dynamic, and start evening up the scales by letting the husband's wishes into the game too. However, this would lead to a horrible problem: once knowing the pleasures of going loose, the wife completely lets go of any restraints she previously had over the relationship, giving up all the power onto the husband. This is where we arrive at an impasse: Page 20. The husband, who was usually shown to be of the laid-back, timid kind acknowledges what they're doing could never lead to anything good, and actually gets the balls to admit that he is unable to lead the relationship on his own, having all the power is too overwhelming for him. Unfortunately, it is the wife that drops the ball in this situation, refusing to stand up again and take control of things, instead she chooses to completely indulge both herself and her husband into meaningless sexual pleasure.

This doujin, in its progression, stands out from the rest of its kind because usually it starts off with (problematic beginning->wholesome ending) but here, instead of solving any problem they ended up becoming completely dysfunctional. You could argue there was a moment they were happy in the middle, but really I don't think that's the case, rather, I believe that's the moment it all went south for them. To elaborate, we start off with a husband that has immoral tendencies, and a wife that's holding him back. The problem here at the start is thay the wife is too harsh on her constraints (which here is sex with a condom lol, but translating to real life it could mean no sex at all) and it causes the husband to turn away from her, so much so to resort to cheating (again here its just some magazines, but you already get the allegory this doujin is making).
